{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WRTnode |model=2 |revision=P (MT7628A) |est_release_date=08/2015 |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=mini module, IoT board |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=Mini PCIe |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628AN |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25Q128FVSG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF, USB 2.0 (pins) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes |wi1_module=WRTnode 2P |wi1_module_if=NGFF |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot Version: 4.3.0.0;, |stock_os=Linux;3.18.21;OpenWrt 15.05 Chaos Calmer |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=root |default_pass="none" |oui=64:51:7E, |oui_eth=64:51:7E |expansion_ngff_num=1 }} {{TagLine|WRTnode 2P IoT Board (MT7628A)}} :[http://wrtnode.cc/html/hardware_2.html Product page] {{•}} [https://github.com/WRTnode WRTnode GitHub] :[http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page WRTnode 1 Wiki] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=首页/en WRTnode 2 Wiki]
====[[WRTnode 2P]]==== *SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @575MHz ([[MIPS 24KEc]]) *Flash: 32MB (NOR), RAM: 256MB (DDR2) *WLAN: WiSoC 802.11bgn 2T2R (300Mbps) *I/O's via NGFF (M.2 2242 Key B) connector: :1x PCIe X1, USB 2.0 host, SD-XC (for microSD), :2x UART, SPI (master/slave), 20x GPIO, I2C, :5x FE (100Mbps) Ethernet, I2S (192K/24bit) *Dimensions: 42 x 22 mm
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX-Software''']
===See also=== :[[:Category:WRTnode|WRTnode]] *[[WRTnode]] 1 (MT7620N) *[[WRTnode (MT7620N)]] (EE) *[[WRTnode 2P]] (MT7628A) *[[WRTnode 2R]] (MT7688A) *[[WRTnode 2Q]] (QCA9531) *[[WRTnode Hi]] (Hi3516A)
